actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the establishment of the Deacon Jacob Estay National Monument.

summary.text: Provides for the establishment of the Deacon Jacob Estey National Monument, North Carolina. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to maintain a cultural center for the performing and visual arts on the site. Authorizes to be appropriated the sums necessary to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the establishment of the Deacon Jacob Estay National Monument.
